recommendations.advice: Engage in 150+ mins weekly of moderate aerobic exercise to improve blood glucose control [1][2][7]
Perform resistance training twice weekly for enhanced insulin sensitivity [3][10]
Break sedentary time hourly with 5-minute activity bursts (walking/stretching) [4][6][8]
Replace sugary beverages with water to reduce glycemic load [5][9]
Monitor blood glucose before/after exercise to prevent hypoglycemia [5][9]
